Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: CollectionType
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: The type of the wrapped collection which holds the elements

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: init()
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: create an empty sorted set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: init(arrayLiteral:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Create a sorted set from an array literal, sorting its content

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: description
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: A textual description of the SortedSet

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: debugDescription
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: A textual description of the SortedSet (for debugging)

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: startIndex
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: The position of the first element in the SortedSet

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: endIndex
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: The position after the last element in the SortedSet

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: index(after:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: The position after the given index

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: index(before:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: The position before the given index

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Accesses the element at the given position

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Accesses a contiguous subrange of the array’s elements

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: insert(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Insert an element into the sorted set if not already present

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: update(with:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Insert an element inconditionally

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: remove(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Remove an element from a sorted set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: remove(at:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Remove the element at a given position

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: filter(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Return a sorted set containing the elements of this set that satisfy the given predicate

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: union(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Return a new sorted set containing the elements of this and another set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: formUnion(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Add the elements of the given sorted set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: intersection(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Return a new set containing the elements that are common to this and the given set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: formIntersection(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Removes the elements of this set that aren’t also in the given set

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: symmetricDifference(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Return a new set with the elements that are either in this or in the given set, but not in both

Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.name: formSymmetricDifference(_:)
Structs/SortedSet.html#/s:7Utility9Sorte.abstract: Removes the elements of the set that are also in the given set and adds the members of the given set that are not already in the set

Structs/Area.html#/s:7Utility4AreaV5star.name: start
Structs/Area.html#/s:7Utility4AreaV5star.abstract: The upper left point in this area

Structs/Point.html#/s:7Utility5PointVyAC.abstract: Initialize a point from a stirng which is formatted as row;column

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV9.abstract: Initialize with a repeated value and dimensions from a given area

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.abstract: Access the element at the given position

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.name: subscript(_:_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.abstract: Access the elements in the given ranges

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.name: subscript(_:_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.abstract: Access the elements in the given ranges

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.abstract: Access the elements in the given area

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVy.abstract: Access the elements in the given area

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV3.name: row(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV3.abstract: Returns the elements in the given row

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV6.name: column(_:)

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV7.name: isValid(row:column:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV7.abstract: Indicate if a matrix contains the given coordinates

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV7.name: isValid(rows:columns:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixV7.abstract: Indicate if a matrix contains the given 2D range

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.name: invert(max:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.abstract: Recode the matrix values by subtracting them from a given maximum value

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.name: extend(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.abstract: Extend conv2 matrix with a given kernel

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.name: dilate(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:7Utility6MatrixVA.abstract: Extend and dilate conv2 matrix with a given kernel

Structs/SortedSet.html.name: SortedSet
Structs/SortedSet.html.abstract: A collection of unique elements which keeps itself sorted

Protocols/SelfSorting.html#/s:7Utility11.name: min()
Protocols/SelfSorting.html#/s:7Utility11.abstract: Return the minimum element in the sorted set, its first element

Protocols/SelfSorting.html#/s:7Utility11.name: max()
Protocols/SelfSorting.html#/s:7Utility11.abstract: Return the maximum element in the sorted set, its last element

Protocols/SelfSorting.html.name: SelfSorting
Protocols/SelfSorting.html.abstract: A collection that keeps its elements lexicographically sorted

Extensions/RangeReplaceableCollection.ht.name: sample(_:)
Extensions/RangeReplaceableCollection.ht.abstract: Take a random sample from a range replaceable collection

Extensions/RandomAccessCollection.html#/.name: indices(around:surround:)
Extensions/RandomAccessCollection.html#/.abstract: Returns the indices around a given index to return a slice that is surrounded by a given element

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: index(diverging:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Returns the index where a collection diverges from another one

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: sum()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Return the sum of all elements in a numeric sequence

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: prodSum(lhs:rhs:)
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Multiply two sequences elementwise and sum up the products

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: mean()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Returns the arithmetic mean of an int collection

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: mean()
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Returns the arithmetic mean of a double collection

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: lowerHalf
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Returns a slice of the collection containing every elements below and including the middle element

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: upperHalf
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: Returns a slice of the collection containing every elements above the middle element

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.name: midIndex
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl7Utility.abstract: The index of the middle element in the collection

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC12C.name: ChildrenType
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC12C.abstract: The type of the child nodes collection

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC10i.name: isTerminal
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC10i.abstract: Indicates if this node contains the suffix of an inserted string

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.name: insert(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.abstract: Insert the elements of a given sequence into the tree

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.name: insert(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.abstract: Insert the elements of a given sequence into the tree

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.name: insert(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6in.abstract: Insert a new member into this node

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6re.name: remove(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6re.abstract: Remove a given string from this tree if present

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6re.name: remove(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6re.abstract: Remove a string from this node if present, and prune leaf nodes if present

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.name: search()
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.abstract: Return a new array with the strings in this tree

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.name: search(pattern:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.abstract: Return a new array with the strings in this tree that satisfy the given pattern

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.name: search(prefix:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.abstract: Return an array with every inserted string in this node, the given prefix prepended

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.name: search(prefix:pattern:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6se.abstract: Return an array with every inserted string in this node that match the given pattern, the given prefix prepended

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC7en.name: endNode(_:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC7en.abstract: Return the node which marks the end of a given string if present

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC9st.name: startNode(of:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC9st.abstract: Return the child node whose label is the prefix of or equal to the given string if present

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC4ha.name: hash(into:)
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC4ha.abstract: Hash this node, respecting only its label

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6is.name: isLeaf
Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC6is.abstract: ////////// Indicates if the node contains any child nodes

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC2ee.abstract: Test equality of two nodes, respecting only the label

Classes/Radix.html#/s:7Utility5RadixC1lo.abstract: Test order of two nodes, respecting only the label
